replies.body:
1. Only include highlights, not just you typing /join, or running around
2. Use some music
3. Use text in the editor, don't type in chat.
4. Don't use bandicam, use OBS or something

replies.body:
Cool video

I suggest that you don't upload gameplay like that, record as much as you can and make a montage of cool stuff you do (like objectives, epic kills, etc). And as others said, music would be nice.

oh and sidenote you can reply to people on the forums just click on the reply button above a person's post
